dataList.content: La casa di Sinclair era la villa più grande del vicinato, locata nella parte più interna della cittadina.
Da lontano era possibile vedere l'enorme fiamma che avvolgeva la tenuta.
Mi presi un momento per provare ad immaginare come poteva essere la cittadina in tempi più pacifici.
Per ricordare il momento dove gli alberi che avevamo visto lì vicino erano ancora verdi e lussureggianti.
Com'era Sinclair in quel periodo.
O quando tutti quelli attorno a lui morirono.
Non riuscivo ad immaginare né felicità, né disperazone.
Ciò nonostante, sperai che Sinclair potesse prepararsi a quello che stava per affrontare.
Tutto questo è… orribile, per non dire altro…
Un cortile che un tempo era stato un gardino rigoglioso, ora era pieno di chiodi piantati a terra.
Molteplici corpi protesici erano stati perforati da quei chiodi.
E la tenuta era avvolta da una fiamma feroce, pronta a consumare tutto ciò che aveva attorno a sé.
Mentre l'attenzione di tutti era sulle protesi…
Lo sguardo di Sinclair si spostò verso un angolo del cortile.
Le tombe, sono state… dissotterrate…?
Seguendo il suo sguardo, vidi tre tombe violate.
L'espressione di Sinclair bastò a me e agli altri Peccatori per indovinare per chi fossero quelle tombe.
…To execute the dead—this is nothing short of a devil's work.
Padre, madre, e sorella.
La famiglia a cui ha accennato… Quello dovrebbe essere il luogo in cui riposano.
Alt… Un Sierra ad ore dodici.
Quel fischio…
Kehehe. Insomma, è semplicemente troppo divertente se ci pensi.
Una figura fece capolino dalla casa in fiamme.
La sua risata era sinistra in ogni modo possibile.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Perché impegnarsi così tanto a seppellire corpi che neanche possono decomporsi… Ho ragione?
Kromer…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Sono sicura che li troverai da qualche parte qui in giro, se ti impegni. Mi ricordo di averLI inchiodati.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Fai il bravo e forse ti dirò dove sono…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Allora, Sinclair? Sei finalmente diventato coraggioso per venire fin qui.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Enough of one to look at a few dead bodies too, right?
Why… Just… Why all this…?
Sinclair couldn't even speak properly.
Where did our Pre Ufficio di Controllo get off to? They've got to turn up at this point…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Ah~ Sinclair's got some buddies!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Looking for the other filthy ratlets that snuck in here?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Okay, okay. Watch closely. I'll turn on the lights, so open your eyes wide!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Tadaa!

dataList.title: LCCB
dataList.content: Krgh, khaag…
Effie…?
Effie was barely breathing. His limbs had been cut away, and deformed prosthetics were crudely lodged in their place.
Effie!!!
He was too mutilated to even speak a single word.
In his current state, it will take around two days for him to completely die.
And the pole piercing through him will only amplify his suffering.
<Then…>
Manager, I happen to know of a method to end a life with as little pain as possible.
It's one that saw many uses, in fact…
May I ask you to give me the order?
I looked to both Gregor and Ishmael.
They gazed back at me, and… as if in acknowledgement, dropped their heads low and bit their lips.
I understood what that meant.
…Rest in peace.
The collar of Outis's clothes brushed against the wind.
Then silence.
And—it's then broken by Kromer's roaring laughter.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Pfh… Pwahahahaha!!
Ah.
At the same time, I could hear something else break.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Really, it's hilarious to watch you all care for each other when you'll all meet the same fate anyway!

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Brings you back, doesn't it, Sinclair?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Your face back then was real priceless.
Kromer.
You have to die.
Yeah, I think that's the right way.
You'll die by my—!
He was interrupted by the sound of a nail dragging across the floor.
…It's Guido.
We thought we had felled him with our best, but not a scratch was on his body now. It was as if all his injuries healed in that short time.
Seeing him walk towards us in perfect condition fatigued the Sinners…
Rendered speechless, all they can muster from their hearts is a deep groan of contempt.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Guido, why couldn't you take out the others?

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Perdoni la mia inettitudine, O Colei che Stringe. La mia incompetenza ha permesso la loro fuga.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: You have to stay alert. You never know what's hidden under those cursed steel craniums.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Le sue parole saranno scolpite nel mio cuore, O Colei che Stringe.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Since the reunion is over, I'll be heading back.
Kromer turns around to walk into the burning mansion.
Kromer!!!
Get back here! I'll… I swear, you—! I'll grab you with my hand and—

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: Nope, Sinclair.

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: It's always been the other way around…
A long smirk dances across Kromer's entire face; it's hard to tell if it's the violent blaze or Kromer's vice that is consuming the other.
And then…

dataList.title: Nagel und Hammer
dataList.content: I am the one who grips.
